1028400.name: Takenoko-Chibis
1028400.description:
To thank the court gardeners for all their hard work in the bamboo garden, the Japanese Emperor rewards them with a new panda: it’s Miss Panda!
Good news! The newcomer doesn’t have much of an appetite. But in the spring you’ll have to work twice as hard to take care of the couple and their babies!

Special features:
• Miss Panda and her babies have arrived: when Miss Panda meets Mr Panda on a tile, you can soon expect to hear the pitter-patter of tiny paws. With your baby pandas, earn bonus points and gain the upper hand over your rivals!
• 18 new Objectives
• New Plot tiles to discover: the Celestial Pond, the Kamis garden, the Sacred Hills, and even the Garden Shed… Each new tile has its own special rules and could completely reverse the outcome of the game.
1028400.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
